catalog_info.title: Quantum Mechanics I
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Linear algebra including matrix diagonalization; Physics 15c or written permission of the Head Tutor.
catalog_info.description: Introduction to nonrelativistic quantum mechanics: uncertainty relations; Schrödinger equation; Dirac notation; matrix mechanics; one-dimensional problems including particle in box, tunneling, and harmonic oscillator; angular momentum, hydrogen atom, spin, Pauli principle; time-independent perturbation theory; scattering.
